TopicTitle: A logo for my space program

Articles.Content:
Yesterday I decided that I needed a logo for my space program highlighting past missions and astronauts from my entire year and a half playing KSP.

After screwing around in GIMP for a few hours I came out with a nearly finished product.

Has anyone else ever made badges/logos for their space program? And if you had would you like to share them?
Hey, that's pretty good! I may have to take a stab at that for Beagle flight.
... I want that ship in the picture on the right. I want that .craft file! And the list of needed mods!

The ship on the right was a monster of a ship I sent out to explore the Joolian system.

Managed to pull off 12 separate landings.

As for getting the ship... it's 356 parts and would most likely melt most peoples computers.

And yes, that's a Bigtrak, that image is from KSP 0.16.
Just looking triggers the KSP theme in my head. A good sign.
